function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The reliance of the service on occupancy and danger models may introduce inaccuracies in identifying high-risk areas for COVID-19 infection.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of directing pedestrians to areas with high risk of COVID-19 infection, leading to potential exposure and transmission of the virus.","Mitigation":"Regular review and update of models based on real-time data and feedback from public health authorities. Incorporation of data on infection rates and transmission patterns.","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms for real-time data analysis and pattern recognition. Integration of public health data and APIs for infection rates and transmission patterns.","People":"Pedestrians using the navigation service, public health authorities responsible for monitoring and controlling the spread of COVID-19.","Owner":"Developers of the navigation service, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Reliance on the assumption that the proposed service provides a substantial improvement in reducing exposure to the virus, without concrete evidence of its effectiveness in real-world scenarios.","Impact":"Misleading the public into believing they are safe from COVID-19 exposure, leading to complacency and failure to adhere to other essential preventive measures.","Mitigation":"Conduct controlled studies and field trials to validate the effectiveness of the service in reducing COVID-19 exposure. Communicate the limitations and uncertainties of the service to users.","Technologies":"Data analytics for performance evaluation, controlled experimental design for field trials.","People":"General public relying on the service for safe navigation, researchers and scientists conducting validation studies.","Owner":"Research institutions, developers of the navigation service."}]}
